pkgmetadata.longdescription: A GeoJson Processing Toolkit // Includes functions for processing GeoJson objects https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GeoJSON relying on 'RFC 7946' https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/pdf/rfc7946.pdf. The geojson encoding is based on 'json11', a tiny JSON library for 'C++11' https://github.com/dropbox/json11. Furthermore, the source code is exported in R through the 'Rcpp' and 'RcppArmadillo' packages.
